plot: Joel, a twenty-something cubicle lackey, is depressed over the recent breakup with his girlfriend. In a crazy effort to get revenge, he fakes his own death in order to make her feel guilty....
title: Dying Days
plot_es: Joel, a twenty-something cubicle lackey, is depressed over the recent breakup with his girlfriend. In a crazy effort to get revenge, he fakes his own death in order to make her feel guilty....
plot_en: Joel, a twenty-something cubicle lackey, is depressed over the recent breakup with his girlfriend. In a crazy effort to get revenge, he fakes his own death in order to make her feel guilty....
